query:
SELECT 
  c.name as country,
  s.name as service,
  s.smshubCode,
  COUNT(*) as total_records,
  GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT p.apiId ORDER BY p.apiId) as api_ids
FROM prices p
JOIN countries c ON p.countryId = c.id
JOIN services s ON p.serviceId = s.id
GROUP BY c.id, s.id
HAVING COUNT(*) > 3
ORDER BY total_records DESC
LIMIT 20;

FROM prices p
JOIN countries c ON p.countryId = c.id
JOIN services s ON p.serviceId = s.id
GROUP BY c.id, s.id
HAVING COUNT(*) > 3
